channel.title: Security Society at LSU
channel.description: Recent content on Security Society at LSU

item.title: Halloween Day 1 - Lost Flag
item.description: While we were we sleeping an evil entity stole and encrypted our flag! Can you get it back? Mouseover the appropriate line for hints. Highlight and right click to copy, and right click on cursor to paste. Hint 1 Remember dotfiles? Hint 2 Less encrypted, more converted to a different base Incompatible Browser D: Type flag here Submit

item.title: About
item.description: Officers President: Cam Shortt Vice President: Ronald Gibson Secretary: Logan

item.title: Task 0 - Find the Flag
item.description: Use your knowledge of Linux to find the contents of "flag" Hint (Mouseover) Look in root Incompatible Browser D: Type flag here Submit
